title: Why the Emoji Skin Tone You Choose Matters
description: WIRED's spiritual advice columnist on whether to use the tone that most resembles your own—or to stick with the original Simpsons-esque color.

title: Twitter’s Moderation System Is in Tatters
description: Disinformation researchers have spent years asking Twitter to remove toxic and fake posts. After Elon Musk’s staff cuts, there’s hardly anyone to talk to.

title: Lyft Aspired to Kill Car Ownership. Now It Aims to Profit From It
description: The company once claimed that ride-hail services and robotaxis would make personal cars obsolete. Mounting losses have prompted a rethink.
